motor_odm package¶

Submodules¶

motor_odm.config module¶

motor_odm.config.configure(motor_client: motor.motor_asyncio.AsyncIOMotorClient, db_name: str) → None¶

Configure the used Motor client and database name, should be called before any database connection and early as possible especially before any document declaration

Parameters

  • motor_client – Instance of configured motor driver

  • db_name – The name of the database used

motor_odm.config.disconnect() → None¶

Disconnects database connection, should be called when webserver tears down

motor_odm.config.get_db_name() → str¶

Get database used for connections

motor_odm.config.get_motor_client() → motor.motor_asyncio.AsyncIOMotorClient¶

Get the used Motor client

motor_odm.cursor module¶

class motor_odm.cursor.MongoCursor(document_class: Type[T], cursor: pymongo.cursor.Cursor)¶

Bases: motor.motor_asyncio.AsyncIOMotorCursor, Generic[motor_odm.cursor.T], AsyncIterable[motor_odm.cursor.T]

async next() → T¶

Advance the cursor.

New in version 2.2.

async to_list(length: Optional[int] = None) → List[T]¶

Get a list of documents.

Parameters

  • length: maximum number of documents to return for this call, or None

Returns a Future.

Changed in version 2.0: No longer accepts a callback argument.

Changed in version 0.2: callback must be passed as a keyword argument, like to_list(10, callback=callback), and the length parameter is no longer optional.

motor_odm.documents module¶

class motor_odm.documents.MongoDocument(*, _id: motor_odm.fields.PrimaryID = None)¶

Bases: Generic[motor_odm.documents.T], pydantic.main.BaseModel

Base Mongodb document class that other documents should inherit to use common functionality, represents a document in mongodb collection primary id of type fields.PrimaryID is automatically generated

eg. without Meta class:

class PersonDocument(MongoDocument):

age: int

name: str

with Meta class to override configuration:

class PersonDocument(MongoDocument):

age: int

name: str

class Meta:

collection_name = ‘person’

db_name = ‘people_db’

class Config¶

Bases: object

orm_mode = True¶
validate_assignment = True¶

Bases: Exception

Bases: ValueError

motor_odm.fields module¶

class motor_odm.fields.PrimaryID¶

Bases: str

represent mongodb _id field of type bson.ObjectID, with enhanced schema

motor_odm.managers module¶

class motor_odm.managers.MongoBaseManager(*args, **kwds)¶

Bases: Generic[motor_odm.managers.T]

Base Manager that all type of managers should inherit to create a new manager:

managers.py

class CustomManager(MongoBaseManager[“CustomManager]):

pass

documents.py

class Document(MongoDocument):

custom_manager = CustomManager()

add_to_class(document_class: Type[T]) → None¶

Bulk create a list of objects

Return type

List[T] Created objects with ids

Parameters

objs – list of objects to create

async bulk_delete(ids: List[Union[bson.objectid.ObjectId, str]]) → int¶

delete many objects using ids

:returns int, number of deleted objects

class motor_odm.managers.MongoBaseQueryManager¶

Bases: motor_odm.managers.MongoBaseManager[motor_odm.managers.T]

query manager responsible for building queries

fetch all documents that matches filter

Returns

List[T]

count of document that matches the filter :return: int

log all fields for debug purpose

async delete() → int¶

delete all documents that matches filter

Returns

int, number of deleted documents

exclude(*fields: str) → motor_odm.managers.MongoBaseQueryManager[T]¶

exclude fields from being returned when querying

Parameters

fields – excluded fields from projection

Returns

new query

filter(**filter_kwargs: Any) → motor_odm.managers.MongoBaseQueryManager[T]¶
add the filter for mongodb find, filter result is not evaluated,

and no db access will happen yet

Parameters

filter_kwargs – the filter to apply as a kwargs

Returns

new query

async first() → Optional[T]¶

fetch the first document that matches filter, returns None if it doesn’t exist :return: T

async get(**kwargs: Any) → T¶

get a document using its fields as filter options

Document.objects.get(id=”…”)

:raises DocumentDoestNotExists :param kwargs: fields :return: MongoDocument

limit(count: int) → motor_odm.managers.MongoBaseQueryManager[T]¶

limit of the query :param count: max count :return: MongoBaseQueryBuilder

only(*fields: str) → motor_odm.managers.MongoBaseQueryManager[T]¶

only return fields when creating a query

Parameters

fields – allowed fields from projection

Returns

new query

MongoCursor[T]
